id.description: Unique identifier for each house listing

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the house

bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms in the house

tenure.description: The tenure status of the property (e.g., freehold, leasehold)

value_dict.leasehold: The property is held on a lease for a certain number of years
value_dict.share of freehold: The property has a share in the freehold of the building
value_dict.ask agent: The tenure status needs to be confirmed with the agent

garden.description: Whether the house has a garden or not

value_dict.0: The house does not have a garden

street.description: The street where the house is located

size_sqft.description: The size of the house in square feet

price_pounds.description: The price of the house in pounds

nearest_station_name.description: The name of the nearest station to the house

nearest_station_miles.description: The distance from the house to the nearest station in miles

postcode_outer.description: The outer part of the postcode where the house is located

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, please predict the price in pounds.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted price of the house in pounds is: .

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, please predict the size in square feet.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted size of the house in square feet is: .

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, please predict the number of bedrooms.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted number of bedrooms in the house is: .

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, please predict the number of bathrooms.
